fifteen_min.name: 15-Min Transformer
fifteen_min.description: Uses 1 day of 15-min BTC data to predict next steps.

one_hour.name: 1-Hour Transformer
one_hour.description: Uses past 24 hourly BTC data points.

twelve_hour.name: 12-Hour Transformer
twelve_hour.description: Uses 12 hours of BTC price data in 15-min intervals.

eighteen_hour.name: 18-Hour Transformer
eighteen_hour.description: Predicts BTC prices for the next day using 18 hours of past data.

one_day.name: 1-Day Transformer
one_day.description: Standard daily prediction using the last 24 hours of BTC price.

two_days.name: 2-Day Transformer
two_days.description: Uses past 2 days of BTC data to predict future trends.

three_days.name: 3-Day Transformer
three_days.description: Uses 3 days of BTC data to predict next movement.

four_days.name: 4-Day Transformer
four_days.description: Predicts BTC price using 4-day historical window.

five_days.name: 5-Day Transformer
five_days.description: Uses 5 days of data for predictions.
five_days.note: Captures longer market moves with less noise.

six_days.name: 6-Day Transformer
six_days.note: Good balance between long- and short-term accuracy.

seven_days.name: 7-Day Transformer
seven_days.description: Trained on 7 days of 15-min BTC data.
seven_days.note: Best for long-term BTC price movement tracking.
